abstract: Herman Cain's 9-9-9 tax plan is a truly terrible idea.
snippet: Herman Cain's 9-9-9 tax plan is a truly terrible idea.
lead_paragraph: By almost any measure - social, political, economic, logical - Herman Cain's 9-9-9 tax plan is nuts, nuts, nuts. Go ahead and jack up the price of nearly everything that moves in the United States with a 9 percent national sales tax on all new purchases and services. Talk about instant branding: every time you buy something, you'll be hit with the Herm Cain tax at the checkout line.
